name: Operation Delta Play4Free
description:
Operation Delta: Hunt down your enemy's to achieve your goal, play in 2 different world's to gain your victory, Can you save the villagers?

NOTE: For help/contact join our Discord via https://www.coding-community.com

& Create a ticket.

CONTROLS:

Walk: W-A-S-D

Switch Weapons: 1 & 2

(Any other keys will be mentioned to you ingame)
